task_description:
# Create Form Input Components

**Linear Issue:** [BUI-88](https://linear.app/builder-project/issue/BUI-88/create-form-input-components)
**Priority:** High
**Status:** Backlog

## Description

Build reusable form input components: text, textarea, select, checkbox, date picker, and file upload.

patterns.component_pattern: Components wrap Material UI components with styled() from @emotion/styled for custom styling. Use StyledComponent pattern with theme parameter.
patterns.prop_pattern: Extend MUI props using Omit<MuiComponentProps, 'variant'> and add custom props like error, helperText, required, disabled
patterns.export_pattern: Export both the component and its props interface. Use barrel export in index.ts
patterns.styling_pattern: Use styled() from @mui/material/styles for wrapping MUI components
patterns.formcontrol_pattern: For form fields, wrap with FormControl, use InputLabel and FormHelperText

existing_implementations.description: Found existing UI component patterns in components/ui/ directory showing how to wrap MUI components
